text: Head trauma is a common cause of significant morbidity and mortality in dogs and cats. Traumatic brain injury may occur after head trauma. Understanding the pathophysiology of primary and secondary injury after head trauma is essential for management. This article reviews the pathophysiology of head trauma, patient assessment and diagnostics, and treatment recommendations.
title: Head Trauma.
journal: The Veterinary clinics of North America. Small animal practice
Vet. Clin. North Am. Small Anim. Pract.
